ModMetaData.name: Crypto Trading Sim - 1.0
ModMetaData.author: Arizona Adi Pradana
ModMetaData.description:
Simulate trade cryptocurrencies using real-time market data in your RimWorld colony! Convert your silver to USD and trade Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other popular cryptocurrencies.
This is a simulation only - no real money or cryptocurrency is involved.
Press the assigned hotkey (default: Delete) to open the trading terminal.
Features: - Multiple cryptocurrency support - Portfolio tracking with profit/loss calculations - Transaction history
Open source: https://github.com/arizonaadipradana/RimWorldCryptoTrader/
